```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(jeksterslabRutils)
context("Test util_check_file_seq.")
```


## Parameters

### Initialize folders in the working directory


```{r param}
tmp <- util_make_subdir()
files_01 <- file.path(
  tmp,
  paste0(
    "filename_",
    "0000",
    1:9,
    ".csv"
  )
)
files_02 <- file.path(
  tmp,
  paste0(
    "0000",
    1:9,
    "_filename",
    ".csv"
  )
)
sapply(
  X = files_01,
  FUN = file.create
)
sapply(
  X = files_02,
  FUN = file.create
)
list.files(tmp)
```


## Results

This will search for {5 digits}_filename.csv


```{r results_01}
results_files_01 <- util_check_file_seq(
  dir = tmp,
  start = 1L,
  end = 9L,
  digits = 5L,
  fn = "filename",
  ext = "csv",
  sep = "_",
  prefix = TRUE
)
```


This will search for filename_{5 digits}.csv


```{r results_02}
results_files_02 <- util_check_file_seq(
  dir = tmp,
  start = 1L,
  end = 9L,
  digits = 5L,
  fn = "filename",
  ext = "csv",
  sep = "_",
  prefix = FALSE
)
```


This will search for {5 digits}_error.csv.
Results 9 items.


```{r results_03}
results_length_09_01 <- util_check_file_seq(
  dir = tmp,
  start = 1L,
  end = 9L,
  digits = 5L,
  fn = "error",
  ext = "csv",
  sep = "_",
  prefix = TRUE
)
```


This will search for error_{5 digits}.csv.
Results 9 items.


```{r results_04}
results_length_09_02 <- util_check_file_seq(
  dir = tmp,
  start = 1L,
  end = 9L,
  digits = 5L,
  fn = "error",
  ext = "csv",
  sep = "_",
  prefix = FALSE
)
```


## testthat


```{r testthat_01}
test_that("length 0", {
  expect_equal(
    length(
      results_files_01
    ),
    length(
      results_files_02
    ),
    0
  )
})
```
```{r testthat_02}
test_that("length 9", {
  expect_equal(
    length(
      results_length_09_01
    ),
    length(
      results_length_09_02
    ),
    9
  )
})
```


### Clean up files and folders


```{r cleanup}
util_clean_dir(

)
```
